Text: I see two seeders are posted here. Why am I not connected to them??? Could someone please help, I have wanted to see this for a while! But I have stopped downloading at 68.8%. Thank you so much.
Great torrent.  This was my first test of my fiber connection, and I am impressed - it downloaded in well under an hour.
what scene is supposed to have subs?
There is a segment of the film that is a parody of Italian films.  The dialogue is in Italian with subtitles.  If the subs are missing I am not downloading this.
Downloaded torrent to only discover the picture quality was poor.  I will get it from Netflix and make a copy.  I don't know why people even upload a movie that looks so bad.
